Here is the list of signs at $LINE, along with their scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Aries tend to be impulsive and reckless, but can also be very enthusiastic and determined.
2. Taurus - 5/10 - Taurus are grounded and practical, but can also be stubborn and resistant to change.
3. Gemini - 8/10 - Geminis are quick-witted and adaptable, making them a great match for $LINE's fast-paced environment.
4. Cancer - 6/10 - Cancers are emotional and empathetic, which can help with customer relationships, but may also lead to emotional exhaustion.
5. Leo - 9/10 - Leos are charismatic and confident, making them natural performers who thrive in the spotlight.
6. Virgo - 3/10 - Virgos are analytical and detail-oriented, but can also be perfectionistic and critical.
7. Libra - 4/10 - Librans are diplomatic and social, but may struggle with indecision and people-pleasing.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Scorpios are intense and passionate, bringing a deep understanding of human nature to the role.
9. Sagittarius - 6/10 - Sagittarians are optimistic and freedom-loving, which can be a great asset for sales, but may also lead to restlessness and boredom.
10. Capricorn - 5/10 - Capricorns are ambitious and disciplined, making them well-suited for the fast-paced environment, but may struggle with self-doubt and criticism.
11. Aquarius - 7/10 - Aquarians are humanitarian and independent, bringing a unique perspective to the role, but may struggle with disconnection from others.
12. Pisces - 4/10 - Pisces are empathetic and imaginative, which can help with customer relationships, but may also lead to emotional overwhelm and distraction.
